name: ModernItemBlocker
title: Modern Item Blocker
author: gjdunga
description: Blocks items, clothing and ammunition temporarily after a wipe or permanently until removed. Provides admin commands via chat, console and RCON with permissions.

permissions.name: modernitemblocker.bypass
permissions.description: Exempts the user from all block checks.

permissions.name: modernitemblocker.admin
permissions.description: Allows access to all administrative commands for managing blocked items.

commands.description: Chat, console or RCON command for listing blocked items and adding/removing entries or reloading configuration.
